key.name: draw-grid
key.description: This sets whether the stereonet-grid should be drawn.

key.name: stereonet-projection
key.summary: Equal area or equal angle projection
key.description: True = equal area. False = equal angle.

key.name: show-legend
key.description: True means that a legend will be drawn by default.

key.name: center-cross
key.description: When True a cross is displayed at the center of the stereonet.

key.name: night-mode
key.description: When True the interface will default to the dark theme.
